Distribution in Russia
(

c). Leningradskaya Prov., Yaroslavskaya Prov., Moscow Prov., Kursk Prov., Ryazan Prov., Belgorod Prov., Tatarstan Republic, Udmurtia Republic, Rostov Prov., Bashkortostan Republic, Orenburg Prov., Chelabinsk Prov., Sverdlovskaya Prov., Severnaya Osetia Republic, Stavropol Terr., Astrakhan Prov., Kirov Prov., Siberia, Far East.

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 11. a.
Colletes daviesanus Smith
, male: metasomal sternum 7 (dorsal view); b. metasomal terga 1 and 2; c.
C. fodiens (Fourcroy)
, male: metasomal sternum 7 (dorsal view); d. metasomal terga 1 and 2; e.
C. similis Schenck
, male: metasomal sternum 7 (dorsal view); f. metasomal terga 1 and 2. Scale bar: 1 mm.

subSubSection.paragraph: General distribution . Ireland , Great Britain , Norway , Sweden , Netherlands , Belgium , France , Germany , Switzerland , Liechtenstein , Austria , Italy , Czech Republic , Slovakia , Hungary , Slovenia , Croatia , Serbia , Finland , Poland , Estonia , Romania , Ukraine , Russia , Turkey , Georgia , Armenia , Kazakhstan , Uzbekistan , Kyrgyzstan , Mongolia , China [Qinghai, Heilongjiang].
